code:
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic load,
    input logic [9:0] data,
    output logic tc
);
    logic [9:0] counter;

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (load) begin
            counter <= data;
            tc <= 1'b0; // Clear tc when loading new value
        end else if (counter > 10'b0) begin
            counter <= counter - 10'b1;
        end
    end

    always @(*) begin
        tc = (counter == 10'b0);
    end
endmodule
[DONE]

issues: Numeric constants should have explicit size (e.g., 1'b0 not 0)
